ios.subtitle: Your second brain on the go

editorialNotes.standard: This Apple Design Award-winning writing app doesn’t bury us in toolbars and technical details. Linking notes is as easy as dropping a hashtag, and formatting your work is a total breeze. We especially love it on iPad.
editorialNotes.short: A writing app makes linking notes as simple as adding a hashtag.
Read, convert, annotate and sign PDFs in just a few seconds.

editorialNotes.standard: This app offers the flexibility you’ve always wished for when taking notes on longer documents. Quickly drag excerpts to a separate workspace, make comments, compare distant sections and more. You’ll forget how you ever read without it.
editorialNotes.short: Easily make notes and comments on the documents you read.
